{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-U |revision=2 (2GB) |price=89 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=Yes |availability=discontinued |est_release_date=12/2012 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=2.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=0.8 |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=Exynos 4412 (Prime) |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=PoP |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9730 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Integrated USB 2.0-compatible 3-port Hub;SMSC;USB3503A;;1; ,,, Over-voltage/Over-current Protection IC;TI;BQ24381;;1; ,,, Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Maxim;MAX98090;;1; ,,, USB Nch High-side Switch IC;Ricoh;R5524N;;1; ,,, Power management IC;Maxim;MAX77686;;1; ,,, HDMI ESD protection;NXP;IP4791CZ12;;1; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, Microphone, Micro HDMI out, Audio out (3.5mm), UART |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |oui_eth=3A:02:DD }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-U2}}
:RAM is LPDDR2 PoP with processor (@880MHz)
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB and 64GB available.
{{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2012/11/30/69-odroid-u-89-odroid-u2-exynos-4412-development-boards/ ''$69 ODROID-U & $89 ODROID-U2 Exynos 4412 Development Boards'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Samsung]]'' Exynos 4412 (Prime) @1.7GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) :GPU: Mali-400 @440MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, eMMC 4.5 connector *RAM: 2GB (LPDDR2) @880MHz
